Flow.description: 3/21/25 VP change some wording for the help text to facility 3/20/25 - CS - Added help text as display text to facility questions 3/19/25 - CS - Added help text to facility questions 3/10/25 - changed so each getRecord matched on address/intake/medicalType
Flow.label: Brio - Location Questions

fields.name: Copy_1_of_screenDoes_another_healthcare_provider_need_to_be_created
fields.fieldText: Does another healthcare provider need to be created?

fields.name: screenRUDoes_another_healthcare_facility_need_to_be_created
fields.fieldText: Does another healthcare facility need to be created?

fields.name: screenDoes_another_healthcare_provider_need_to_be_created
fields.fieldText: Does another healthcare provider need to be created?

fields.name: screenDoes_another_healthcare_facility_need_to_be_created
fields.fieldText: Does another healthcare facility need to be created?

fields.name: Does_another_healthcare_facility_need_to_be_created
fields.fieldText: Does another healthcare facility need to be created?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_2_of_displayHealthcareProvider
fields.fieldText: What is the name and address of the facility where you received your Depo shots?

fields.name: screenLocation4Name_of_Location
fields.fieldText: What is the name of the facility where you received your Depo-Provera shots?
fields.helpText: DO NOT INCLUDE ADDRESS OR PROVIDER NAME IN CM LOCATION NAME

fields.name: doNotIncludeAddressHelpText3
fields.fieldText: DO NOT INCLUDE ADDRESS OR PROVIDER NAME IN CM LOCATION NAME

fields.name: displayDPFacilityType
fields.fieldText: Can you please specify the type of medical facility where your Depo-Provera shots were administered?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_2_of_displayHealthcareProvider
fields.fieldText: At what medical center were you diagnosed with meningioma?

fields.name: screenLocation3Name_of_Location
fields.fieldText: What is the name of the facility you were diagnosed at?
fields.helpText: DO NOT INCLUDE ADDRESS OR PROVIDER NAME IN CM LOCATION NAME

fields.name: doNotIncludeAddressHelpText2
fields.fieldText: DO NOT INCLUDE ADDRESS OR PROVIDER NAME IN CM LOCATION NAME﻿

fields.name: displayDPDiagnosedFacilityType
fields.fieldText: Can you please specify the type of medical facility where you were diagnosed with your cancer?

fields.name: Copy_2_of_displayHealthcareProvider
fields.fieldText: What is the name of the doctor that officially diagnosed you with meningioma?

fields.name: screenLocation2Provider_First_Name
fields.fieldText: What is the first name of the doctor that officially diagnosed you with meningioma?

fields.name: screenLocation2Provider_Last_Name
fields.fieldText: What is the last name of the doctor that officially diagnosed you with meningioma?

fields.name: displayHealthcareProvider
fields.fieldText: Could you please provide the name(s) of the healthcare professional who prescribed your Depo-Provera?

fields.name: screenLocation1Provider_First_Name
fields.fieldText: What is the first name of the healthcare provider that prescribed this product to you?

fields.name: screenLocation1Provider_Last_Name
fields.fieldText: What is the last name of the healthcare provider that prescribed this product to you?

fields.name: locationExistingMessage3
fields.fieldText: The Provider that you entered is already saved on this Intake. Either edit on previous screen or click 'Next'.

fields.name: locationExistingMessage4
fields.fieldText: The Location that you entered is already saved on this Intake. Either edit on previous screen or click 'Next'.

fields.name: locationExistingMessage5
fields.fieldText: The Location that you entered is already saved on this Intake. Either edit on previous screen or click 'Next'.

fields.name: locationExistingMessage
fields.fieldText: Duplicate Record Found, you cannot proceed with creating this record.

fields.name: locationExistingMessage2
fields.fieldText: The Provider that you entered is already saved on this Intake. Either edit on previous screen or click 'Next'

fields.name: displayMedicalFacility
fields.fieldText: What is the name of the facility and address you were diagnosed at?

fields.name: doNotIncludeAddressHelpText1
fields.fieldText: DO NOT INCLUDE ADDRESS OR DR NAME IN HOSPITAL/CLINIC NAME

fields.name: screenName_of_Location
fields.fieldText: What is the name of the hospital/clinic you were diagnosed at? (DX Facility)
fields.helpText: Examples: Memorial Medical Center, Intermountain Health, CareNow Urgent Care, Foothill Family Clinic...

fields.name: displayRounduPFacilityType
fields.fieldText: Can you please specify the type of medical facility where you were diagnosed with your cancer?

fields.name: displaySuccess
fields.fieldText: CM Location records have been created. Please continue the questionnaire
